data.eml:eml: Melastrongygaster, a new genus of the tribe Strongygastrini (Diptera: Tachinidae), with five new species from Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shima, Hiroshi (2015): Melastrongygaster, a new genus of the tribe Strongygastrini (Diptera: Tachinidae), with five new species from Asia. Zootaxa 3904 (3): 427-445, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.3.9
